trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a control designer requires a preview instance of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指示控件设计器是否需要在设计时控件的预览版实例。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Apply the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute to a control designer class to indicate the type of preview control that is supported by the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 将 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 特性应用于控件的设计器类，以指示控件设计器支持的预览控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to change a preview control for design-time rendering without affecting the actual persisted instance of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改而不会影响实际的持久化的实例的关联控件的设计时呈现预览控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute when declaring a custom designer class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，指定 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute，声明从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>派生的自定义设计器类时

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property for the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 值的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 特性属性确定的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>成员在基的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性`true`以指示设计器使用关联控件的临时副本来生成设计时 HTML。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 对临时控件的更改不会保留。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性`false`以指示，设计器返回的控件实例，专门<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>属性，从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 将针对控件对象的更改会保留。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner> class is marked with the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>类标记为与设置为 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute `true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CalendarDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer uses the preview control with the automatic style formatting task, which allows the user to preview various autoformat stylesthat can be applied to the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 设计器将预览控件使用自动格式设置的任务，这样用户就可以预览各种 autoformat stylesthat 可以应用于日历的样式。

trans-unit.source: As the user selects different autoformat styles in the user interface, the selected style scheme is applied to the preview control.
trans-unit.target: 在用户选择其他自动套用格式样式用户界面中，选择的样式方案适用于预览控件。

trans-unit.source: Applying a new style to the preview control does not change the scheme that is applied to the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 将新样式应用到预览控件不会更改应用于的实例的方案<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>设计器中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控件设计器声明中，未指定 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>行为是等效于指定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>作为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Designer classes derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members, and ignore the SupportsPreviewControlAttribute attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设计器类派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>成员，并忽略 SupportsPreviewControlAttribute 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To determine the expected behavior for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>, see the reference documentation for the derived control designer class.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>，请参阅派生的控件设计器类的参考文档</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>的预期的行为

trans-unit.source: For general information about using attributes, see [Attributes Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff) and [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的常规信息，请参阅[的特性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a4daf212-2410-423d-a800-7a08864e9bff)和[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about design-time attributes, see [Attributes and Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设计时特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性和设计时支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class and sets the initial value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>类并设置的初始值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 通常，不需要创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>类直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> to the class declaration of the custom control designer in the source code.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>到自定义控件设计器的源代码中的类声明。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The initial value to assign for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>.
trans-unit.target: 要分配<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl*>的初始值

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class that is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>设置为默认预览值的类。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the Default field is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性的默认字段设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A> method to determine whether the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property is set to the default preview value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>方法来确定是否为值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性设置为默认预览值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object represents the same preview attribute setting as the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否表示相同的预览属性设置与当前实例的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The Equals method overrides the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法重写<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Equals method compares two instances based on the value of their <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法比较两个实例的值基于其<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if obj is a attribute and its value is the same as this instance of ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 是特性，并且其值是此实例的相同 ; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method overrides the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 方法重写<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetHashCode method generates the same hash code for two objects that are equal according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 方法生成相同的哈希代码的两个对象的相等根据<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures, such as hash tables.
trans-unit.target: 适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code for the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例的 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> class is set to the default preview attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否的当前实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>类设置为默认预览属性值。

trans-unit.source: The IsDefaultAttribute method compares the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object with the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property of the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> field.
trans-unit.target: IsDefaultAttribute 方法的值进行比较<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>对象的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>的静态属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default>字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.Default> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref> is equal to the default preview attribute value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前实例的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute"></xref>等于默认预览属性值; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer requires a temporary preview control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件设计器是否需要在设计时临时预览控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you specify a value for the SupportsPreviewControl property by applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute to a custom designer class declaration.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过应用指定 SupportsPreviewControl 属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>属性设为自定义设计器类声明。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SupportsPreviewControl property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute determines the behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> members in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>属性确定<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>中基本<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>成员</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>的行为</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>的 SupportsPreviewControl 属性的值

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `true` to indicate that the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: 将 SupportsPreviewControl 属性设置为`true`以指示设计器使用关联控件的临时副本来生成设计时 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 对临时控件的更改不会保留。

trans-unit.source: Set the SupportsPreviewControl property to `false` to indicate that the designer returns the control instance, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property, from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 将 SupportsPreviewControl 属性设置为`false`以指示，设计器返回的控件实例，专门<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>属性，从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the control object are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 将针对控件对象的更改会保留。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer uses a temporary copy of the associated control for design-time preview; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the designer uses an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> control that is contained in the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设计器使用的关联控件的临时副本进行设计时预览，则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果设计器使用的实例<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>设计器中包含的控件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>
